ai-mil3.2.4:1.2_0: “Venerable sir, he who does not feel anything. enemy does nothing is felt.”
ai-mil3.2.4:1.6_0: “Great king, if you feel a pleasant feeling, if you don’t feel a painful feeling, you don’t feel a painful feeling.”
ai-mil3.2.4:1.7_0: “Sir, how does one feel a physical feeling?”
ai-mil3.2.4:1.8_0: “What is the cause, what is the reason for this?”
ai-mil3.2.4:1.10_0: ‘I feel a single feeling, if it feels it, does not contemplate it.’”
ai-mil3.2.4:2.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when you feel a painful feeling, why is it not?”
ai-mil3.2.4:2.2_0: “Great king, there is no way a perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, but the astute will not wait for a long time.”
ai-mil3.2.4:2.3_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil3.2.4:6.1_0: The fourth wonderful and married girls
